overview: The story of Basti and Raffaela. Both are “mid-20s”, Raffaela is currently writing her bachelor's thesis and is not getting anywhere, and Basti is working in a graphics start-up company and is frustrated. Raffaela breaks up, Basti accepts it and feels unable to do anything. Luft tells of the state of agony, an agony of the internship generation, which faces a multitude of possibilities in its life and yet is unable to take a path to make a decision.
title: Luft
